name: Root Monster
description:
You, the player are a lumberjack who's goal is to cut down a monster plant terrorising everything around it. The plant will fight back using It's roots to try to get rid of the player. You as the player have to dodge, attack and survive all of it and get rid of it once and for all. 

This game took part in the FGJ 2023!

Music by: Cecil Opia
